mapper.select:
SELECT r.*, f.fleetName,d.driverName FROM t_driver_rota r LEFT JOIN t_system_fleet f ON r.fleetId = f.id LEFT JOIN t_archives_driver d ON r.driverId = d.id WHERE 1=1
AND r.driverId in (SELECT id FROM t_archives_driver WHERE driverName LIKE '%${driverName}%')
AND clockIn like '%${clockIn}%'
AND r.fleetId =#{fleetId}
